description.text:
I am a Systems and Computer Engineering graduate and I am in the process of pre-specialization in Cybersecurity Engineering.
I have experience in the area of web development with JavaScript based technologies such as React.js and Express.js, I also have knowledge in the area of management and handling of relational database as well as in the area of web design using tools like Figma.

I am always looking to expand the horizons of my knowledge and work on my capabilities.

projects_subtitle.text: Some of the most outstanding projects I have worked on

movies_finder_description.text: Web platform with OMDBAPI integration for detailed information on series and movies.

weather_visualizer_description.text: Web app that uses OpenWeather API to obtain weather data from a specific location.

color_scales_generator_description.text: Color scale web tool based on a color name or its hex, ideal for designers and developers.

translator_description.text: Web app that makes use of MyMemory API for instant translations in several languages.

iris_extension_description.text: Azure DevOps extension to perform source code analysis and vulnerability detection.

bookstore_sales_system_description.text: Web CRM for sales and inventory management, invoicing and reporting generation of a bookstore.

e_commerce_description.text: E-commerce web platform for sales and inventory management for a technology products store.

bank_collection_system_description.text: Web system based on role-based auth for the payment of services and banking transactions.

bookstore_sales_system_api_description.text: Endpoints, with a system for storing images in the server and returning this to the front-end.

bank_collection_system_api_description.text: Endpoints for the management of banking transactions, prioritizing security and data integrity.

vulnerabilities_dashboard_description.text: Clean, clear and professional design, ideal for the purpose of vulnerabilities management.

neurodivergent_people_mobile_app_descrip.text: Inclusive, intuitive and accessible design for the target audience, prioritizing UX for user comfort.

vs_marketplace_extension_description.text: Clean and professional design, oriented to a pleasant UX with a user-friendly UI, ideal for data visualization.

contact_text.text: If you have any questions, need help, or just want to say hi, feel free to send me a message. I will get back to you as soon as possible ^^
